description.jp:
大空を自由に飛びまわる空賊に憧れる
ダルマスカ王国の孤児。兄を奪った帝国
の支配を憎みながらも行動できず過ごし
ていたが 祖国解放を目指す王女
アーシェと出会ったことから 運命は急
転。幼馴染のパンネロや空賊バルフレア
と共に 壮大な戦いに身を投じた。
description.gl: An orphan from the Kingdom of Dalmasca who dreams of becoming a sky pirate. While he despised the empire for taking his brother's life、 he was helpless until a twist of fate brought him and Princess Ashe together. Along with his childhood friend、 Penelo、 and the sky pirate、 Balthier、 he sets out on a cosmic journey to free their homeland.

jp.text: オレぐらいになると\n脱け出すなんて簡単なんだよ
それはオレのもんだぜ！！
少しは不安だけどさ\nどんな奴か楽しみだよ
オレだってガキじゃないんだから\nもうわかってる
一緒に来たし\n一緒に行くんだ

gl.text: The Imperials'll need more than a dungeon to stop me.
Yeah、 I don't know what we'll find. I like it better that way.
Really、 it's all right. I know it wasn't your fault.
You'll make it. You got good friends.

desc.en:
4-HIT Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets

After using [Red Spiral], [Red Spiral+], [While Whorl], or [While Whorl+]
• Becomes [Pyroclasm+] for 1 turn
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 80%
desc.gl:
4-hit Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
Becomes Pyroclasm+ for only next turn after using Red Spiral, Red Spiral+, White Whorl, or White Whorl+

奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する

ターゲット以外にも20％分のHPダメージ

または「ディープハザード」「ディープハザード＋」を使用した
次の行動時のみ「メルトクリムゾン＋」に変化

12-HIT magic BRV attack + HP attack

Maximum HP damage limit +200% (up to 299997)

• Own BRV will not drop below 20% of Max BRV (if below 20%, does not decrease further)
* Same character's BURST effects do not stack

12-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
BRV damage dealt can exceed limit of 9999 by 150% (up to 24997)
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV (up to 299997)
HP damage dealt can exceed limit of 99999 by 200% (up to 299997)

• Party: BRV cannot be lowered to less than 20% of MAX BRV (if BRV is less than 20% of MAX BRV, BRV will not lower further)
Does not stack with identical characters' burst effects

（20％未満の時はそれ以上減少しない）
同一キャラクターのバースト効果は重複しない

desc.en:
[Red Spiral] use +2

Triggers [Whiteout] from second use

When using [Red Spiral], [Whiteout]
• Respectively increases BRV potency by 108%, 150%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Increases own BRV by 25% of HP damage dealt

When using [Red Spiral]
• [ATK Up] effect +30%; duration +4

After using [Red Spiral] 5 times
• [Red Spiral] becomes [Red Spiral+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 20%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Increases own BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
• [Whiteout] becomes [Whiteout+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 20%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Increases own BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
　∟ Self: 16 turns [Flight to Freedom]

[Flight to Freedom]
• Raises Attack by 30%
• Restores BRV by 30% of Initial BRV
desc.gl:
Red Spiral use +2

Red Spiral triggers Whiteout from second use

When using Red Spiral, Whiteout:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Increases BRV by 25% of HP damage dealt

When using Red Spiral:
 • Slight ATK Up boost, duration +4

After using Red Spiral 5 times:
 • Red Spiral becomes Red Spiral+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt)
 • Whiteout becomes Whiteout+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt; self: 16 turns Flight to Freedom)

desc.en:
[White Whorl] use +2

Triggers [Luminescence] from second use

When using [White Whorl] and [Luminescence]
• Respectively increases BRV potency by 108%, 120%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When using [White Whorl]
• Increases own BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
• Self: 8 turns 40% [MAX BRV Up] for 8 turns

After using [White Whorl] 5 times
• [White Whorl] becomes [White Whorl+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 20%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180%
　∟ Raises BRV based on 100% of HP damage dealt
• [Luminescence] becomes [Luminescence+]:
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 20%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180%
　∟ Self: 16 turns [Flight to Freedom]

While buffed
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%

While [Flight to Freedom] is active
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]:
　∟ Becomes a magic BRV attack
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 60% compared to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Lowers Action Delay by 4
desc.gl:
White Whorl use +2

White Whorl triggers Luminescence from second use

When using White Whorl, Luminescence:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using White Whorl:
 • Increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
 • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up II

After using White Whorl 5 times:
 • White Whorl becomes White Whorl+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; increases BRV by 100% of HP damage dealt)
 • Luminescence becomes Luminescence+ (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; self: 16 turns Flight to Freedom)

With active buff:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)

While Flight to Freedom active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (magic BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost from BRV Attack+; turn rate+)
